means: 静水力学的，流体静力学的

word_mean: 流体静力〔学〕的：指液体处于静态的

sentence.Network_en: It is this hydrostatic pressure that maintains the turgidity of plant parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 就是这种流体静压维持植物各部分的膨胀度.

sentence.Network_en: The velocities are independent of hydrostatic pressures.
sentence.Network_cn: 速度与流体静压力无关.

sentence.Network_en: A point worth emphasizing is that hydrostatic equilibrium is fulfilled with great accuracy in stellar atmosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 值得强调指出,在恒星大气中,流体静力平衡是非常精确地成立的.

list.abs: 翻译界 - 翻译资源- 资料列表 ... hydrostatic anchor 静水压锚 hydrostatic bearing 静压轴承 hydrostatic bell 水压钟.
米洛维奇说，对于利用RTM成型预浸料的最大挑战是压力是否足够，即膜内的静水压力（hydrostatic pressure）是否足够将材料压实，并排出固化过程中产生的气体。这就如同在热压釜固化过程中，利用加压的氮气为真空袋提.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: probably from Greek hudrostatēs 'hydrostatic balance', from hudro- 'water' + statikos (see static)
